titles.title: To extend and modify the temporary suspension of duty on Fludioxinil Technical.
To extend and modify the temporary suspension of duty on Fludioxinil Technical.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Trade.

bill.summary: Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to temporarily suspend, through December 31, 2011, the duty on 1H-Pyrrole-3-carbonitrile, 4-(2,2-difluoro-1,3-benzodioxol-4-yl)-(fludioxinil technical) (CAS No. 131341-86-1).
